TopicTitle: may i ask what has happened to the moderators

Articles.Content:
First if this is squads decision then i fully understand and do question there authority.

some of the moderators have stopped being moderators.

captain skunky and tosh to name a few, may i politely ask what happened to them

What happen to Cptn_Skunky only a few people know, like me, but I'm not going to tell you so we can respect his great work as Community Manager.

I don't know about Tosh though I thought he still was moderating.

I cant speak about Captain Skunky royalkingofgames, but I'm sure if you searched enough you'd find what you are looking for, it's best to remember all the great work he did here for the community though.

As for Tosh, he found he just wasn't playing KSP anymore so is taking a break, he'll be back one day.

Also, I'm going to have to close this, sorry.

Edited October 10, 2012 by sal_vager
